product_name: The North Face Kilowatt T-Shirt - Men's
long_description: Featuring FlashDry-XD(TM) fabric that combines quick-drying performance with high durability, The North Face Kilowatt T-Shirt for men provides comfort and high performance for tough workouts. Specialized FlashDry-XD fabric wicks moisture, breathes well and dries quickly; plus, it's abrasion-resistant to increase durability. Ventilation panels under the arms, along the sides of the torso and down the back increase breathability. Stitch-free taping reduces chafing. The North Face Kilowatt T-Shirt for men is engineered for a comforable range of motion while you run.
short_description: Featuring FlashDry-XD(TM) fabric that combines quick-drying performance with high durability, The North Face Kilowatt T-Shirt for men provides comfort and high performance for tough workouts.
